conversation.text: You will start by preheating the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
I have preheated the oven. What next?
You will want to season the chicken breasts in a large baking dish.
evidence: Place the chicken breasts into a large baking dish and season them

conversation.text: Should I use cooking spray in the pan before seasoning the chicken breasts?
Yes, you will use a nonstick spray or olive oil to grease the pan.
evidence: First, spray the baking dish with nonstick spray or olive oil.

conversation.text: I have greased the pan and placed the chicken breasts in it. What do I use to season the chicken?
Pour 1 cup (240 mL) of Diet Coke, 1 cup (240 mL) of ketchup, and 2 tablespoons (30 mL) of Worcestershire sauce into a medium sized mixing bowl.
Do I pour the sauce mixture over the chicken breasts?
Yes, pour the sauce over the chicken before covering it with foil.
evidence: Pour the sauce over the chicken

conversation.text: 50 minutes. Do you have a meat thermometer?
evidence: Let the chicken bake for about 50 minutes

conversation.text: Yes. What should I do next?
Check the temperature after 40 minutes. The chicken will be done when its internal temperature reaches 165 degrees Fahrenheit.
evidence: use a meat thermometer to start checking it after about 40 minutes
chicken is done cooking, the internal temperature will be 165 °F

conversation.text: The chicken is has reached the desired temperature. Is there anything you recommend to pair with this dish?
Baked Diet Coke Chicken tastes great served over rice or noodles. Or if you'd rather make it a main dish, it pairs well with sides, such as mashed potatoes, steamed broccoli, or a side salad.
evidence: great served over noodles or rice
makes a great main dish when served with sides, such as mashed potatoes, steamed broccoli, or a simple side salad

conversation.text: Those sound like great options! Is there anything else I should do?
Enjoy your meal! Remember, baked Diet Coke chicken can be refrigerated for up to four days if kept in an airtight container.
evidence: store leftover baked Diet Coke chicken in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 4 days

conversation.text: Thank you! You have been very helpful.

recipe.title: How to Bake Diet Coke Chicken

procedure.description: To make delish, healthy Diet Coke chicken in the oven, you’ll first need to preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C). Then, you can prepare the chicken while the oven is heating up.

procedure.summary: Place the chicken breasts into a large baking dish and season them.
procedure.description: First, spray the baking dish with nonstick spray or olive oil. Then, spread the chicken out a bit so that they don’t touch. Then, season with salt and pepper to taste. To bake 4 large chicken breasts, you’ll likely need a baking dish that is at least 9 inches (23 cm) by 13 inches (33 cm) large.

procedure.summary: Mix the Diet Coke sauce in a bowl.
procedure.description: Pour 1 cup (240 mL) of Diet Coke, 1 cup (240 mL) of ketchup, and 2 tablespoons (30 mL) of Worcestershire sauce into a medium sized mixing bowl. Use a whisk to mix the sauce until it’s combined completely.

procedure.summary: Pour the sauce over the chicken and cover it with foil.
procedure.description: Add the sauce by pouring it on top of the chicken and around the sides, making sure that all the pieces are coated. Then, cover the dish with aluminum foil.

procedure.summary: Bake the chicken in the oven for about 50 minutes.
procedure.description: Place the covered baking dish with the chicken and Diet Coke sauce into the preheated oven. Let the chicken bake for about 50 minutes. To ensure that the chicken doesn’t over cook, use a meat thermometer to start checking it after about 40 minutes. When the chicken is done cooking, the internal temperature will be 165 °F (74 °C).

procedure.summary: Remove the dish from the oven and serve it immediately.
procedure.description: Baked Diet Coke chicken is great served over noodles or rice. It also makes a great main dish when served with sides, such as mashed potatoes, steamed broccoli, or a simple side salad. You can store leftover baked Diet Coke chicken in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 4 days.
